value:
$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Oh, Ylgr, I am so happy to hear you
were able to cross paths with your
wonderful friend once again!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Hee-hee! You don't need to go and
make a big deal out of it...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Hey! My ears are burning... What're
you two giggling about over there?!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|You two may be proof that Nifl and
Múspell can get along...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Yeah! He's actually really nice!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|I ain't NICE! What in the hell're
ya— You tryin' to make a fool
outta me?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't mean to be
rude or anything...$k$pIt's just...I'm really happy I have more
chances to spend time together with
you—that's all!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Bah... Geez... You really know how
push my buttons, kid.$k$pListen up! Don't waste your time
trying to be friends with filth like
me! It's for your own good!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Ow ow ow... Sorry, everyone...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Sheesh! This is exactly why kids
should just stay out of sight...
C'mon—this way! Let's move!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|My... Hm-hm...$k$p$Sbs150|
